subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers shook up their lineup yesterday, adding scoring and grit by trading for Los Angeles left wing Sean Avery. The Rangers also received a prospect in the deal in return for the veteran forward Jason Ward and two Rangers prospects.
snippet: The Rangers shook up their lineup yesterday, adding scoring and grit by trading for Los Angeles left wing Sean Avery. The Rangers also received a prospect in the deal in return for the veteran forward Jason Ward and two Rangers prospects.
